trial_type.Description: Which category item belongs to, 1=category 1, 2 = category 2

prot1distance.Description: Number of features differing from category 1 prototype

trainitem.Description: 1 = is an old training item, 0 = is a new generalization item

exemplar.Description: Summed similarity generated from exemplar model

prototype.Description: Summed similarity generated from prototype model
